states: mostly smooth with several weak punctures

states: with several foveae posteroventrally and smooth groove
mostly absent, represented by small, shallow depression

states: with several crenulae along ventral margin
with rugae on ventral third and on margins
with no crenulae along ventral margin

states: not excavated, posterior margin not elevated
weakly excavated, with posterior margin not elevated
deeply excavated, with well-defined posterior margin

states: punctate in anterior half, areolate posteriorly
characters.name: propodeum <sculpture>

states: with long, blunt, wide ridge anteriorly
characters.name: anterior areolae of propodeum <sculpture>

states: consisting of only one smooth, straight, transverse ridge
with additional transverse carina present, defining two extra areolae
with one carina on either side anterad opposite carina
with carina branching into two carina before reaching edge of propodeum
characters.name: <anterior transverse carina of propodeum--sculpture if complete>
first tergum <ratio X longer than wide>
second plus third tergum <ratio X longer than wide>
ovipositor <ratio X length of hind femur>
<summary of color>
data: <SUMMARY.>
<SUMMARY.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg yellowish orange, coxa, trochanter, trochantellus, and femur sometimes melanic in part. Midleg yellowish orange except femur sometimes melanic in part. Hind leg yellowish orange except coxa distolaterally, tibia apically, and tarsus melanic. Forewing banded from base: yellow, black, yellow, black. Hind wing yellow with black band in apical third fourth. Terga 1-4 yellowish orange, 5-8 melanic. Ovipositor sheath melanic with yellowish orange spot at apex.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except metanotum, propodeum, and metapleuron yellowish orange. Legs melanic except foretarsus, basal part midtibia, hind coxa, hind femur, and basal part hind tibia yellowish orange. Forewing banded from base: yellow, black, yellow, black. Hind wing yellow with one black band in apical third fourth. Terga 1-4 yellowish orange, tergum 5 tergite melanic, sternite yellowish orange, tergi 6-8 melanic. Ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except mesonotum sometimes with black spots. Foreleg and midleg yellowish orange except both femur and tibia sometimes melanic or partly melanic. Midtarsus sometimes melanic. Hindleg melanic except yellowish orange coxa, femur, and tibia basally. Forewing yellow basally and black apically with a sharp distinction, costa melanic. Hind wing yellow basally, black in apical eighth. Metasoma yellowish orange. Ovipositor sheath melanic, sometimes yellowish at apex.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except propleuron melanic. Foreleg and midleg melanic except tarsi yellowish orange. Hindleg yellowish orange with the following parts melanic: coxa laterally, trochanter, trochantellus, sometimes hind femur basally, hind tibia apically, and tarsus. Forewing entirely black but darker apically. Hindwing entirely black. Metasoma yellowish orange, with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum sometimes yellowish orange posteriorly. Foreleg and midleg entirely melanic except foretarsus yellowish orange. Hindleg mostly melanic, coxa yellowish orange but melanic laterally, femur yellowish orange centrally. Forewing banded clear, black, clear, black. Hindwing entirely infuscate. Terga 1-4 yellowish orange. Terga 5-8 and ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except metanotum, propodeum, and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg entirely melanic except foretarsus yellowish orange. Hindleg mostly melanic, coxa mostly yellowish orange but melanic laterally, hind femur mostly yellowish orange but melanic apically and basally with a melanic area distolaterally. Forewing and hindwing entirely black. Terga 1-4 and 6 yellowish orange, tergi 5, 7, and 8 melanic. Ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange apically. Mesosoma melanic except metanotum, propodeum, and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hindleg mostly yellowish orange with the following parts melanic: coxa laterally, trochanter, trochantellus, femur basally and sometimes apically, tibia apically, and tarsus. Forewing black but darker apically. Hindwing entirely black. Metasoma entirely yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head yellowish orange except antenna and rarely vertex of head melanic. Mesosoma entirely yellowish orange. Foreleg mostly yellowish orange, femur sometimes melanic centrally, tibia sometimes melanic apically. Midleg mostly yellowish orange, femur sometimes melanic in apical third, tibia melanic in apical fifth. Hindleg melanic except trochanter and trochantellus sometimes melanic, tibia melanic in apical eighth, and tarsus melanic. Forewing and hindwing black. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except metanotum, propodeum, and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hindleg melanic except coxa and femur yellowish orange, and tibia sometimes mostly yellowish orange or with an yellowish orange area distolaterally. Forewing and hind wing entirely black. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and dorsal third of metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hindleg mostly melanic except coxa yellowish orange in basal four fifths, femur yellowish orange, and tibia sometimes yellowish orange centrally. Forewing and hind wing black. Terga 1-6 yellowish orange. Terga 7-8 and ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propleuron sometimes dark yellowish, metanotum sometimes yellowish orange, and propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind coxa, femur, and most of tibia yellowish orange, hindleg otherwise melanic. Forewing clear basally, black in apical third with an angled distinction. Hind wing entirely clear. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange or mostly yellowish orange but melanic ventrally. Mesosoma mostly melanic except metanotum sometimes yellowish orange, and propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi sometimes yellowish orange. Hind leg highly variable in coloration. Forewing clear basally, black in apical third with an angled distinction. Hind wing entirely clear. Terga 1-4 yellowish orange. Terga 5-8 yellowish orange, melanic, or partly melanic. Ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange apically. Mesosoma melanic. All legs melanic, except foretarsus and sometimes midtarsus yellowish orange apically. Forewing and hind wing both black basally, clear apically. Tergum 1 yellowish orange but median tergite melanic in posterior quarter. Tergum 2 melanic dorsally, yellowish orange elsewhere. Tergum 3 melanic, but sometimes anterior half of stergite yellowish orange. Terga 4-8 and ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind coxa, femur, and most of tibia yellowish orange, hind leg melanic otherwise. Forewing and hind wing entirely black. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres entirely or apically yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except propleuron melanic. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both coxae and tarsi yellowish orange. Hind coxa, femur, sometimes trochanter and trochantellus, and lateral part of tibia yellowish orange. Hind leg otherwise melanic. Forewing and hind wing entirely black. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except mesoscutum melanic. Foreleg and midleg both entirely yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa in basal twelfth, femur, and tibia in basal seven eighths. Forewing and hind wing banded from base: yellow, black, yellow, black. Terga 1-3 yellowish orange. Tergum 4 yellowish orange but tergite melanic posteriorly. Terga 5-8 and ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except propleuron sometimes melanic. Foreleg yellowish orange except femur melanic or melanic centrally, foretibia sometimes dark yellowish. Midleg melanic except coxa yellowish orange or yellowish orange basally, midtarsus yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa mostly yellowish orange but melanic laterally, femur mostly yellowish orange but melanic in basal twelfth, and tibia mostly yellow byt melanic in apical eighth. Forewing yellow basally and black apically with a sharp distinction and costa melanic, or banded: yellow, black, yellow, black, basal black band sometimes not complete posteriorly. Hind wing yellow basally, slightly black in apical quarter. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except foretarsus yellowish orange. Hind leg mostly melanic except yellowish orange as follows: coxa, lateral portion of femur. Metasoma yellowish orange except tergite of tergum 7 sometimes melanic. Ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg both entirely yellowish orange. Hindleg yellowish orange except coxa melanic laterally, trochanter and trochantellus melanic, tibia melanic in apical eighth, and tarsus melanic. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except entire fortarsus and basal portion of midtarsus yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except sometimes posterior portion of coxa and lateral portion of tibia yellowish orange. Terga 1-7 yellowish orange. Tergum 8 melanic. Ovipositor sheath melanic except sometimes yellowish at apex.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except pronotum sometimes with melanic spots and propleuron sometimes melanic or dark yellowish. Foreleg and midleg melanic except forecoxa sometimes yellowish orange, foretibia sometimes dark yellowish, foretarsus yellowish orange, midcoxa yellowish orange or yellowish orange basally, midtarsus yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa yellowish orange or mostly yellowish orange but melanic laterally, femur yellowish orange, and tibia mostly yellowish orange. Forewing yellow basally and black apically with a sharp distinction and costa melanic, forewing entirely black, or forewing clear basally, black in apical third with an angled distinction. Hind wing entirely black or entirely clear. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except propleuron sometimes melanic. Foreleg and midleg mostly melanic but both tibia yellowish orange apically and both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa yellowish orange in basal four fifths and femur sometimes yellowish orange centrally. Forewing and hind wing black. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange apically. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa and femur yellowish orange. Forewing and hind wing black. Metasoma yellowish orange except ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind coxa yellowish orange but melanic laterally, hind femur yellowish orange or yellowish orange but melanic basally, and hind tibia mostly yellowish orange but melanic in basal eighth. Hind leg otherwise melanic. Forewing clear basally, black in apical third. Hind wing entirely black or clear. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except foretarsus yellowish orange. Hind leg mostly melanic except yellowish orange as follows: coxa, femur, and tibia laterally. Forewing clear basally, black in apical third. Hind wing black or clear. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma melanic except propodeum and metapleuron yellowish orange. Foreleg and midleg melanic except both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa and femur yellowish orange. Forewing and hind wing black. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>

<SUMMARY. Head melanic except maxillary and labial palpomeres yellowish orange. Mesosoma yellowish orange except pronotum sometimes melanic ventrally, propleuron sometimes melanic or dark yellowish orange, and mesopleuron sometimes melanic ventrally. Foreleg and midleg melanic except forecoxa sometimes yellowish orange, midcoxa and midtibia sometimes yellowish orange basally, and both tarsi yellowish orange. Hind leg melanic except coxa yellowish orange, sometimes melanic laterally, femur yellowish orange, and tibia yellowish orange in apical seven eighths. Forewing yellow basally, black apically with a sharp distinction and costa melanic. Hind wing yellow basally, black in apical twelfth. Metasoma yellowish orange with ovipositor sheath melanic.>
<SUMMARY.>

states: mostly yellowish orange but melanic basally
mostly melanic, but yellowish orange apically
